aha#rmAq(gm)qsEnaq rAtriqM pIva#sAq&pO yUqShENa# GRuqta(gm) rasE#naq SyAM ~Mvasa#yA dUqShIkA#Bi-rhrAqduniq-maSru#BiqH pRuShvAqM diva(gm)# rUqpENaq nakSha#trANiq prati#rUpENa pRuthiqvIM carma#NA CaqvIM CaqvyO# pAkRu#tAyaq svAhA &&la#bdhAyaq svAhA# huqtAyaq svAhA$ || 52 
(aha#raq - ShTAvi(gm)#SatiH) (A20)
